'Creation' is an epic historical fiction novel by Gore Vidal which was
published in 1981. In 2002, he published a restored version, adding four
chapters that a previous editor had cut. He also added a brief 2002 foreword
explaining what had happened to the book in its original version and why he
restored the cut chapters.
